alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 20 at 4:47AM MST until December 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM PST THIS MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 13 to 18 inches possible. Wind chills 20 below zero. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, and Pierce. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
